title: Game won't close even when no one is in the game
body: So, me and my friend decided to do a 1v1 on Howling Abyss, and when we both left it is supposed to end the game and send you back to the client. But it says reconnect after 30 minutes of me and my friend not being in the game. What do we do ?

replies.body: It sounds like you guys could be experiencing a ghost game.  Our network team is investigating this now, with updates on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  This should resolve on its on after a bit, but hang tight!
